title: A Weekend Trip
description: Daniel talks about a short trip he took last weekend.
speaker: Daniel
text: Last weekend, I took a short trip to a small town near my city.
I went there by train on Friday evening.
On Saturday, I visited a local market and tried some traditional food.
The weather was sunny, so I walked around the town and took many photos.
On Sunday, I felt tired but happy.
I returned home in the afternoon and rested for the rest of the day.
It was a simple but enjoyable trip.
